attraction_reviewComments: Tuesday farmer's market is fun,. 2nd Saturday events and Cruising Grand in the spring and summer. Lots of places to eat and meet up with friends.

The shops on Grand Avenue are classic! Support small busineses and enjoy the stroll down Grand Avenue!
